    • Method Detail

      • formatAndTranslate

        public static java.lang.String formatAndTranslate​(java.lang.String keyMessage,
                                                  java.lang.Object... args)
        Used to factorize code & increase readability by avoiding String.format(I18n.get(...), ..., ...) calls.
        Parameters:
        keyMessage - the key of the message in the i18n file
        args - the arguments to replace in the message
        Returns:
        the formatted and translated message
